11221111112211111112.content:
"WHAT'S WRONG WITH YOU?" A tall woman asked loudly.

Carol looked up surprised. The woman shouted so hard some other people stopped eating and looked at her. Carol knew that most people were't fond of people who were fattening up their children so she also learned herself to stay calm in this kind of situations.

"Excuse me what do you mean?" Carol asked on a tone like the woman just talked about the weather.

"What's wrong with you?" The woman still talked loudly.

Carol looked in the eyes of the woman and knew that the only reading she was't shouting was because she did't want that everyone in the food court would notice her. But Carol knew that she was furious.

"There's nothing wrong with me. I'm perfectly healthy. Thank you for you concern."

Carol hoped the woman would go away but it was obvious she was't planning on doing that. Carol saw the woman had trouble to control herself. The woman would have liked it to scream at her so hard that people outside the food court could hear it clearly but knew that would give a bad impression of her.

"Maybe you are healthy but clearly sick in your head! What do you think you're doing?"

"I'm afraid I don't understand you." Carol said calmly. "I'm just eating here with my daughter. Is that a crime?"

"Eating? Well it looks more like you were fattening her up! stuffing her like a Christmas turkey! You daughter is clearly to fat and you seem to be glad if she eat's more and becomes even fatter! You are a sick person! There already is a weight problem in our country and it seems you try to help it!"

Carol noticed some people were looking at them. Partly because they were wondering what was going on and because the woman talked so loud and since she screamed: "What's wrong with you?" So loudly she got every ones attention. Some of the people were confused which one was right. Sure Kalie was obvious a fatter then a normal sized girl but was it their right to say something about it. Some of them had their own children and also would't like it if someone would tel them that they did't raised their child right. Even then it was no reason to make such a drama about it. They were surprised Carol stayed so calm.

"My daughter is a healthy girl. A growing girl so she needs enough food." Carol said still calm but she must admit it was getting hard for her to stay calm.

Kalie was looking for her mother to the other woman a bit scared. She herself saw no problem with how much she had eaten. All right maybe it was a bit more then she could handle but that was a mall mistake anyone could make. Her mother gave her a lot of food but she never forced her to eat more then she could.

"A growing girl! Growing in which size? You're fattening her up! You're terrible! I should call child welfare!"

Carol did't liked this. It could go the wrong way.

"Miss could you please mind your own business? I raise my children how I want to! Come on Kalie I think we can better go. I have more important things to do than listening to a stupid bitch that thinks her passport give her the right to say anything that comes in her mind!"

Carol and Kalie walked out the food court but the woman still looked at them.

"This is't over." She whispered.

1122111111221111111222122212121121111212.content:
It was the sun that woke Haley up at the ungodly hour of 6:15 the next morning. She had totally forgotten to close the blinds, allowing the too-bright sunlight to stream through and render all chance at going back to sleep impossible. So, with a great sigh, she heaved herself out of bed and opened the door-

-only to find Casey standing worriedly outside, pacing back and forth around the hallway. Haley yawned.

"Casey, what's-"

"Hungry!" interrupted the youngest sister, patting her own sizable belly.

Haley laughed and patted her sister's head. "Alright, you silly billy, so am I. Let's go get Kalie and then-"

She stopped, suddenly, her eyes fixed on Kalie's room. So suddenly, in fact, that Casey walked right into her eldest sister's ample rear. "Huh?" she said, looking around confusedly.

Haley, instead of answering, called out, "Kalie?"

No answer. Haley walked towards the door, calling "Kalie?" to no avail. Casey followed worriedly, hunger pangs forgotten. The door to her room was slightly ajar; a bad sign, as Kalie always, without fail, closed it. It squeaked ominously as Haley pushed it open.

The room was empty. The bed had clearly been slept in, but there was no longer a Kalie sleeping in it. To Haley, a habitually lazy girl who rarely got up before 9, this was inconceivable- which meant that something was very, very wrong. Could somebody have kidnapped her? she wondered. To Casey, she said, "Follow me- we'd better go and find her."

The two sisters thumped down the stairs, roving eyes scanning the living room for any signs of their bigger sister. She wasn't on the couch, she wasn't in the hallway, she wasn't outside...so where...?

Rustle.

Casey noticed it first. Nervously she pulled on Haley's shirt and pointed at the door to the kitchen. "What-" said Haley crossly, but another rustle cut her off. Together, the two sisters padded to the kitchen door, pushed it open ever so stealthily...

...only to discover Kalie, stuffed to the brim and passed out on the kitchen floor amid desiccated packaging and a small ocean of crumbs. Haley and Casey let out a relieved sigh. "So she's just been eating...phew, that's a relief," Haley said, wiping her brow with a chubby forearm. Casey, ever the curious one, poked Kalie's overstuffed belly. Even six hours later, it was still packed full, and stretched up nearly as high as Casey was tall. She giggled and started playing a beat. Still Kalie slumbered.

Haley shrugged. "Well, she's clearly eaten, might as well have something for myself..." She opened the refrigerator, expecting to get a glass of milk and maybe a bit of leftover mashed potatoes. Instead, there was nothing but blank shelves. Tch, of course, thought Haley, couldn't expect the fridge to remain safe. But, as she opened more and more cabinets, it soon became clear that there was absolutely nothing to eat. Every single scrap and bit of edible substance had made its way into Kalie's vastly overfilled belly. Haley gazed into the depths of the last possible cabinet, equally emptied, and cried, plaintively, "What'll we do for breakfast?"

"Breakfast?"

Haley spun around in shock. Kalie stretched luxuriously, pushing plastic wrap and old containers out of the way as she did so. Kalie looked into her older sister's confused face with some amusement.

"Well, what is it? I'm starving!"

134.content:
"Girls, I'd like to talk to you all for a minute," Carol announced. All three girls looked at her, curious, and Carol continued, "I was reading the paper earlier today, and apparently, ah... ninety percent of all girls aged three to nine years old don't eat enough, and as a result aren't growing up as big and strong as they could be."
The girls looked alarmed - well, Kalie looked alarmed. Casey looked confused, and Haley looked sceptical.
"But I saw on the news just today that girls nowadays are eating too much," Haley said, frowning, "it even said that lots of girls our age are too heavy."
Carol shook her head.
"Well, it must be mistaken!" she exclaimed, "Girls your age don't eat enough to get all the nutrition they need, so I want you all to make a really big effort to eat more for me, okay? So at meals, even when you feel full, make sure to keep eating to get all the nutrition you can, alright?"

Kalie and Casey nodded, both perfectly happy to eat more food - but Carol could see that Haley was conflicted. On one hand, she knew her oldest loved eating food - but on the other...
"Won't we... like, get chubby if we eat too much?" Haley asked hesitantly, looking down at her chunky belly. The nine year old wasn't anything more than chubby, but the outline of her rounded belly was clearly visible through her tight top.
"No, no, don't worry about that," Carol laughed, "You'll be fine. If anything, you'll grow taller more quickly, so you might even get slimmer overall!"

That seemed to satisfy Haley.
"Well, if you're sure," she shrugged, finishing her ice cream without another protest. Carol was pleased with herself - at this rate, all her girls would be lovely and plump in no time! Smiling widely, she returned to the kitchen.


Over the course of that afternoon, Carol did her best to keep her daughters as full of rich, fattening food as she could. Candy, chips and even doughnuts - all found their homes in the bellies, and hopefully soon the waistlines, of Haley, Kalie and Casey. There was the occasional objection that they felt full, but overall the afternoon went very smoothly, and before they knew it it was dinnertime.
This would be the first real test - when the three young girls attended the call for dinner, they were astonished to see a veritable mountain of food waiting on each of their plates. By comparison, Carol and their father Dave had regular-sized portions on their plates - and they hadn't been snacking all afternoon, either.

They tucked in enthusiastically though, making good headway as their parents watched - Carol with motherly satisfaction, Dave with confusion. After a little while, he turned in confusion to his wife.
"Dear, what's with the huge portions for the kids?" he whispered, thoroughly nonplussed, "They've got more than they'd normally eat in a day on their plates!"
Carol bit her lip.
"Ah, just following a new strategy I found in a magazine," Carol whispered back, "The idea is that you teach moderation by giving them really big servings, so they, uh, learn self control."
"They learn self control by eating a lot?" Dave repeated to himself, not understanding in the slightest, "Are you sure?"
"I'm certain, dear. It's a really big thing at the moment - all the magazines are talking about it," Carol lied, "You know you were saying a couple of weeks ago that you were concerned Haley is getting a little chunky? Well, this should sort that out in no time."

For a moment, Dave looked like he was going to raise further objection. After a moment though, he shrugged.
"Well, if you're sure, darling. The kids are your field of expertise, after all," and with that, he let the matter rest.

As the two whispered to one another, the girls were still eating. They'd each eaten perhaps three quarters of their meals, but the last quarter seemed to be challenging. All three were visibly full, their bellies swollen and aching.
"Come on girls," Carol encouraged them enthusiastically, "just a little more!"
"I'm full..." protested Kalie, one hand pressed to her aching stomach. Her top had ridden up a little, and a wedge of her pudgy belly was visible in the gap.
"You need to get your nutrition, Kal," Carol enthused, "Come on! Just a few more forkfuls. And you, Haley - you look like you have plenty of room left! Go on, get it down!"

At their mom's energetic prompting, the girls managed to finish their meals - albeit with much groaning and complaining. By the time all three plates were clear, all the girls looked like they were about to burst. Kalie's top had ridden up almost past her navel, revealing much of her chunky midsection. Her stomach was so swollen that she almost looked pregnant - a trait shared by Haley. The eldest daughter had a sizeable belly at the best of times, but now with an afternoon of filling snacks plus a huge plate of mac and cheese inside of her, her stomach looked huge. The material of her tank top was stretched tight over it, the thin material straining to conceal a belly that was anything but.

"You all did really well this afternoon," Carol said to them, smiling proudly as she gazed upon her overfed daughters, "So well, in fact, that I think you all deserve a treat. I know I don't normally allow television after dinner, but let's watch a film together tonight!"
The girls all cheered, forgetting their discomfort as they all made their way through to the living room. Carol put on a Disney film, then hurried back into the kitchen. She had a surprise for them...


After the movie had been running for an hour or so, the girls were feeling a little better. Their stomachs were busy at work digesting their immense meal, and though they still felt fairly stuffed they were at least partially recovered. It was at that moment that Carol entered - carrying an enormous tray of twenty chocolate brownies. The girls all stared, licking their lips despite themselves.
"I know you're probably still a little full from dinner, but I thought since you've been so good today, you deserve a real treat," she smiled. She quickly divvied up the brownies - Casey got four, Kalie six, and Haley got ten. "Eat them up while they're still warm!" Carol smiled, "They're good for you."

Somehow hungry again despite their swollen middles, the girls tucked in. The brownies were incredibly rich - Carol had added plenty of extra butter and chocolate - and so delicious that once they had started eating them, they could barely stop. Brownie after brownie was consumed, and by the time the film was over all twenty had disappeared. The only evidence of them existing at all was in the girls' overbloated bellies, and on their chocolate-stained fingers and faces.

Now stuffed, swollen and exhausted, the three girls went straight to bed - and immediately after that, to sleep. As they slept their stomachs churned, struggling with the arduous challenge of digesting the thousands of calories the girls had consumed and converting it all into fat for storage. The thought of that process was what kept Carol awake, even as her husband and daughters slept; she just couldn't stop thinking about how all that food was going to look once it had found its permanent home on her daughters' thighs, on their faces, and best and most of all, on their bellies.

1343.content:
The change in the three girls’ lifestyles was sudden and drastic. They hadn’t exactly been eating perfectly healthily before – Haley chubby belly hadn’t come from salads and water, after all – but their new eating habits were an order of magnitude worse. Carol spent just about every moment she had available stuffing her daughters with all sorts of junk, from rich pastries to candy to takeaway fast food, their bellies swollen and full to their limits near-constantly. Every drink was sugary soda or a heavy milkshake, every meal featured seconds, thirds and dessert. It was a non-stop tidal wave of junk food, the time not taken up by meals occupied by relentless snacking and lounging around the house. She even sent her elder daughters into school with backpacks full of candy and chips, with strict instructions to finish them all before the end of the day.

The girls were delighted. As far as they were concerned, this was heaven; all the delicious food they could eat, with the express permission – and, indeed, encouragement – of their mother to force down as much as they could manage. Sure, the tummy-aches from being constantly overstuffed were irritating, but they were more than worth it. They were living out every child’s dream.

Inevitably, the toll of their spectacularly overindulgent new lifestyles soon began to show on their bodies, and Carol watched with rapt delight as her daughters grew quickly chubbier. After only a couple of weeks, the results of her overfeeding were already obvious. Casey, the youngest at three years old, was looking distinctly softer all over, her layer of baby-fat thickening with each passing day. It wasn’t too noticeable yet, but she was definitely putting on weight. With Kalie, the middle daughter, the changes were more obvious. She’d always been balancing precariously on the line between average and chubby, but now for the first time she was definitely in the latter camp, her belly softening and bulging forwards with new flab. Her clothes were looking increasingly tight around her midsection, visibly struggling to cover up the entirety of her bulging stomach.
The most distinct change, however, was with Haley, the oldest. She had already been quite chubby before all this, but now after a couple of weeks of pure, uninterrupted overeating she was looking heavier than ever. The plump belly that had made her look almost pregnant at times was now more fat and swollen than ever, a thick cushion of flab that swelled out in front of her and often escaped the undersized confines of her tops. Her stomach wasn’t the only part of her affected, however; her butt and thighs were definitely chunkier than they had been, even jiggling slightly whenever she moved, and even a hint of a double chin could be seen making her face rounder than ever.

Carol was immeasurably pleased by her daughters’ progress. She could barely keep her hands off their newly softened bodies, finding any excuse to give a chubby belly a quick squeeze or to pinch a little bulge of flab between finger and thumb. Finally, her daughters were looking nice and plump.

Things couldn’t go all her way forever, however, and before long a challenge to her enthusiastic fattening of her offspring presented itself…
